Summary Note:
Anna Sarah Fischer and the RM met at a networking event in Vienna. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Having worked for over 45 years, Anna Sarah Fischer brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons she decided to join.
Family Background: Anna Sarah Fischer is currently widowed. She has 3 kids called Lisa, Maier and Schmidt.
Education Background:
Anna finished secondary school at Bundesrealgymnasium Salzburg in 1973.
She then attended University of Klagenfurt, which she graduated in 1978.
Occupation History:
Anna Sarah Fischer is a 69 year old retired Operations Director from Austria. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Anna Sarah Fischer's first role was as a Plant Manager at Schoeller-Bleckmann AG, where she worked diligently from 1980 to 1984 to establish a strong reputation.
At AT&S Austria Technologie & Systemtechnik AG, she held the position of Operations Director from 1984 till retirement, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 760000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 4160000 EUR.

She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
